Title: Chapter 36
Writer: Michael Dobbs (based on the novels by), Andrew Davies (based on the mini-series by), Beau Willimon (created for television by), Frank Pugliese
Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly, Mahershala Ali
Plot: Frank needs to deal with Petrov one on one, while Claire tries to preserve the peace-keeping mission. Sacrifices must be made.
